title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.7 - Amounts charged in previous years to operating expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.7 - Amounts charged in previous years to operating expenses

State Regulations

Nothing herein stated shall be taken as permitting the
recording in the original cost shown in the continuing property record of
amounts charged in previous years to operating expenses, operating taxes or
other income or surplus accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
154.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
